title: "This AI lyrics generator strings your random words into songs"
excerpt: "And if none of that works, they could try out a new AI lyrics generator called keyword2lyrics. The system was created by Mathi Gatthi, a data scientist from Argentina, who told TNW he got the idea from his own songwriting struggles: Sometimes I have a few ideas that I want to turn into a song,"
